Articles.Content:
This is a basic thread for the parts that I make as I make them. As of right now, there is not much to show; however, in the future, as my skills increase, I will have more items to list here. 

My first engine (yet to be named) is very much a WIP. If you have any advice on how to make the best possible quality, please let me know.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/BC1xv)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-04T06:02:13Z" title="04/04/2015 06:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 4, 2015</time> by NathanKell**
  
fixed album

Welcome to the forums!

I took the liberty of editing your post so the album would show up--here, one uses [imgur]album\_ID[/'imgur] (remove ') where album\_ID is the bit after /a/ in the URL.

As for the part--looks like a nice start! However, right now all you have is a bell with a plate above it. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) I'd suggest deciding whether it should be pressure-fed, gas-generator, or closed-cycle, and adding appropriate detailing; I'd also <hobbyhorse> suggest ditching the plate</hobbyhorse>--that would allow someone to use the engine on any stage they wanted to without it looking odd.
